programme.title: World's Deadliest: Killer Three
programme.desc: These are the predators that prove that when it comes to hunting prey, size doesn‚Äôt always matter. These are the World's Deadliest: Little Killers miniscule menaces with the ability to take down prey several times their own size. .

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Whale
programme.desc: Intelligent, cultured and deadly, the killer whale dominates every ocean on earth and as our planet changes, this top predator changes with it. They are elite, marine hunters with an extremely diverse diet including other apex predators like the great white shark. Killer whales pursue their prey like a pack of wolves and have multiple killing techniques. .

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Killers
programme.desc: In the animal kingdom, females are tough, feisty and fearless. But these lady-killers dont just get by on their good looks; they use their paws, claws and jaws to ensure survival for themselves and their offspring. From the fierce protectiveness of a mama grizzly bear, to the cunning teamwork employed by lady lions this hour of WORLDS DEADLIEST is dedicated to the Lady Killers.

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Killer Three
programme.desc: The animal world is full of predators who can kill in the blink of an eye. These are the World's Deadliest: Speed Kills -- and they dish out death like fast food. From the fleet-footed cheetah, to the stargazer fish that swallows prey in a tenth of a second, to the venomous black mamba -- the fastest and deadliest snake in the world -- Speed Kills puts you in the line of fire to show you the insane speeds at which some creatures kill.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: For the Prairie Dogs in northern New Mexico, winter has nearly come. In the Highlands, Carl and the pups prepare for hibernation, but an unlikely alliance of deadly predators creates a heightened threat for every dog in the territory.

programme.title: Shark Attack 360
programme.desc: The team investigate a flurry of shark bites suddenly occurring off the coast of Long Island. Their investigation will call upon local experts who have noticed changes around the time the bites began. And with sand tiger sharks likely responsible for the bites, Diva takes a dive with them in search of some answers.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pol‚Äôs new livestock aren‚Äôt potty trained; their sheep hut isn‚Äôt draining properly and has now been transformed into a Pee Palace. It‚Äôs late fall and the winter deep freeze is just around the corner, so the family needs to get it fixed fast. The Pol‚Äôs also get a new sheep for their farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pol clan gets to work on creating Beth‚Äôs dream garden. To beat the incoming rainstorm, an exhausted Ben works around the clock to finish building the garden‚Äôs pond and waterfall. Noticing her brother is near his breaking point, Beth plans a special surprise to lift his spirits.

programme.title: Shark Attack 360
programme.desc: The 360 team investigate several bites all involving one species: the bull shark. These attacks occurred around the world but what links them together? Diving deeper into this animal‚Äôs unique anatomy, Diva discovers how and why they can occupy these surprising locations. In the field, the team get up close and personal to these incredible animals and put shark senses to the test.

programme.title: Ten Deadliest Snakes
programme.desc: From the wetlands of Rio Grande to the mighty Amazon rainforest, Brazil is a hotspot for deadly snakes and Nigel is seeking them out as he counts down his top ten. programme.title: Ten Deadliest Snakes
programme.desc: Mexico is home to an incredible 400 snake species, nearly a fifth of which are venomous. Nigel searches high and low for his top ten, from ancient oak and pine forests to the towering cacti of the baking hot Mexican desert. Rattlesnakes dominate the landscape, but the widely feared terciopelo and the beautiful Taylor's Cantil are also in the running for number one spot.

programme.title: Ten Deadliest Snakes
programme.desc: To survive in the scorching deserts of Oman and the United Arab Emirates is no mean feat. The snakes that live here are highly-adapted and Nigel puts his skills to the test to find his top ten. Will the saw-scaled viper's powerful venom and lightning fast reflexes be a match for the backwards strike of the puff adder? On his journey Nigel encounters the ancient 'ships of the desert' and a seriously cute hedgehog.

programme.title: Shark Attack 360
programme.desc: The team investigate a flurry of shark bites suddenly occurring off the coast of Long Island. Their investigation will call upon local experts who have noticed changes around the time the bites began. And with sand tiger sharks likely responsible for the bites, Diva takes a dive with them in search of some answers.

programme.title: Shark Attack 360
programme.desc: Diva uncovers a mysterious spate of shark bites in California. But these bites are in the winter when the sharks are usually long gone. To understand the reasons behind this cluster of encounters the 360 team gets to work. As they scour the world for clues, their investigation takes them to Israel, Australia and South Africa.

programme.title: Shark Attack 360
programme.desc: The 360 team investigate a spate of shark attacks in Ballina, a small seaside town just on the east coast of Australia. The team puts local theories to the test, myth busting old beliefs and revealing fascinating shark biology. In the lab, Diva analyses the data and uncovers a starling truth behind these bites.

programme.title: Shark Attack 360
programme.desc: The 360 team investigates an attack on a foil boarder in Australia. Are sharks attracted to these boards and does something stimulate an attack? Meeting with hydrodynamic experts, the team discovers that these boards may trigger sharks. In the field, the team examine how and why.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol performs emergency surgery on a dog that swallowed a rope toy. Dr. Nicole examines a tiny kitten with a big eye problem, and Dr. Lisa helps a horse suffering from heaves. A fungal infection glows on a Pomeranian while a lump grows on a Pitbull. The Pols celebrate their 55th wedding anniversary with cake decorated by grandkids, Silas and Abigail.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Dr. Pol treats three bovines and one tiny rabbit before heading to the Netherlands with Diane to celebrate his 80th birthday. Just because the Docs away, it doesnt mean that the clinic slows down. A very vocal pig needs surgery to treat a hernia, a blocked cat is in pain and requires immediate relief, and a puppy is feeling the effects of eating something inedible. .

programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds assembles ‚ÄúThe Superzeros,‚Äù a team of somewhat pitiful animals with unexpectedly awesome superpowers. programme.desc: The battle between predator and prey is not always about power and strength. Knowing what lurks in the dark can mean the difference between life and death. Extraordinary powers that penetrate darkness give some creatures the edge, and the chance to live another day.
